snippet: Former Gov. Don E. Siegelman of Alabama failed in his bid to get the Supreme Court to review his conviction on bribery charges, which revolved around a health care executive's payment of a campaign debt.
abstract: Former Gov. Don E. Siegelman of Alabama failed in his bid to get the Supreme Court to review his conviction on bribery charges, which revolved around a health care executive's payment of a campaign debt.

headline.main: Justices Refuse to Hear Ex-Governor's Appeal
headline.print_headline: Supreme Court Refuses An Ex-Governor’s Appeal
